q: beginning to unfold, one thing remains a mystery: the judges/mentors who will join Simon Cowell on camera. The former American Idol star says that a decision about the panel has yet to be made. He explained, The truth is we honestly haven't made our mind up yet. We're talking to a number of people and then I expect to make an announcement, I would say within 3 to 4 weeks, it might be a bit longer, I'm not sure, as to who the panel are going to be. It's a crowded dance floor and it's time for the people there to start strutting their stuff and see who's got the next booty.
